title: Trade Spotlight | What should you do with ABB India, Tech Mahindra, Dixon Technologies on Friday? - Moneycontrol
content: Trade Spotlight | What should you do with ABB India, Tech Mahindra, Dixon Technologies on Friday?  Moneycontrol
description: Technically, the medium term chart formation in Tech Mahindra is still on the weak side but due to temporary oversold situation, a sharp pullback rally from the current level is not ruled out.
